ST.xhtml: initialize := THIS^.processes.initialize.request();
lock := THIS^.processes.lock.request();
unlock := THIS^.processes.unlock.request();
reset := THIS^.processes.reset.request();
changeOperatingState := THIS^.processes.changeOperatingState.request( state := state );
gotoKnownPosition := THIS^.processes.gotoKnownPosition.request( name := name );

gotoNewPosition := THIS^.processes.gotoNewPosition.request( rotationPosition := rotationPosition, rotationOffset := rotationOffset, translationPosition := translationPosition, doRotation := doRotation, doTranslation := doTranslation);
abort := THIS^.processes.abort.request();

Buffer to write all logging to
Temporary buffer to write logging by parts (sub-statemachines) to

ST.xhtml: THIS^.parts.rotation._log( name := 'rotation', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.translation._log( name := 'translation', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.io._log( name := 'io', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.gotoProcedure._log( name := 'gotoProcedure', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.configManager._log( name := 'configManager', buffer := subBuffer); LOGGER( name := name, actualStatus := THIS^.actualStatus, previousStatus := THIS^.previousStatus, buffer := buffer, subBuffer := subBuffer, pHealthStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.healthStatus), pBusyStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.busyStatus));
